name: Maze Escape (itch) (cvives652)
description:
You are trapped in a procedurally generated maze and you need to find all the keys before time runs out to escape! 

The game is still a work in progress!

Controls:

WASD - Move

LShift - Walk

Space - Jump

Left Mouse - Shoot Paint

ESC - Pause

Team:

Michael Bowser

Christian Vives
